Text:
This show is the best!!! 

If you havnt seen this yet, than you should, i guarantee it will not disappoint.

Thanks OP for uploading, keep it up
@condo767 the show is somewhat like Torchwood, except it doesn't completely suck ass like that show does, so that makes it great in comparison. ;)
I am the only one, who is hoping that the terrorists will win and the fascists future wont happen?
There is a scene missing/cut.  At 31:47 it hops in the middle of the scene then it cuts that same scene off at 32:00.
@smeghead1983  Yeah I know that. But still, its not a future I want to live in...

Lead female is a terrible actor
Rooting for the bad guys to win, will never happen
Terrorism is war for the poor
War is terrorism for the rich

Well I don't really care that much about acting, I simply want to keep watching the episodes because of the story (besides Rachel and Lexa are both on my hottest actresses toplist). Have you guys noticed that the future the story describes is actually the present we live in told in a 'bit' different way? I mean our present is already ruled by wealthy people we don't know s**t about. In the future described by this story the world is ruled by big corporations... big, bad, greedy corporations. I hope I'm not the only one who can see the similarities.
